titles.title: Clean Energy Victory Bond Act of 2025
Clean Energy Victory Bond Act of 2025
To direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue Clean Energy Victory Bonds.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
